members.member:
This function will unzip a file and export it's parsed files of TModel.
The model you're looking for. Name of the ZIP. CSV Configuration. Ftp FolderPath. IEnumarable of the Files that the ZIP contained using the TModel. Used the example here to build. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/8313791/sharpziplib-examine-and-select-contents-of-a-zip-file
